ilastik-napari
==============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which ilastik-napari installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using ilastik-napari, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load ilastik-napari/0.2.4-foss-2023a
```
